title: Tell Me Why You Love Me
description: Freesia's life has always been a rollercoaster. It changed for the worse when her mother suddenly died. Follow her as she finds ways to cope with change, moving in with her father who she hates, and coping with 4 step-brothers, unrelated to her by blood. Will those boys fill her with painful nostalgia, or will they be the salvation she was searching for?*Includes foul language*
author: Noa Melody
